A career fair, also referred commonly as a career expo or career exhibition, is an event in which employers, recruiters, and schools give information to potential employees. Job seekers attend these while trying to make a good impression to potential coworkers by speaking face-to-face with one another, filling out resumes, and asking questions in attempt to get a good feel on the work needed.
